title: Mammoth
description: A brown wooly mammoth with large curved tusks. Can also be used to represent a mastodon.
apple_vendor_description: The mammoth emoji on Apple devices is a magnificently rendered prehistoric creature, brought to life with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and realistic textures. Its shaggy fur is depicted with exquisite detail, and the tusks curve elegantly, showcasing the smooth gradients and soft lighting that define Apple's aesthetic. This emoji evokes a sense of ancient history, the power of nature, and the wonders of the past. It's a striking visual reminder of Earth's long and fascinating evolutionary journey.
